cards.rules_text:
Forewarn — {U}, Reveal Urza from your hand: You get a one-time boon with “When a planeswalker you control enters, proliferate. [i](Activate up to one forewarn ability during each of your upkeeps. To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
[+1]: Draw a card. Create a blue artifact token with “Your maximum hand size is increased by one.”
[-XX]: Return up to X target permanents from the battlefield to their owners' hands. For each permanent returned to your hand this way, draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
When Sorin, Last to Fall is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had a loyalty counter on it, return it to the battlefield with one fewer loyalty counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to Sorin, Last to Fall, sacrifice him.
[+1]: Sorin, Last to Fall deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.
cards.special_text:
When Sorin, Last to Fall is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had a loyalty counter on it, return it to the battlefield with one fewer loyalty counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to Sorin, Last to Fall, sacrifice him.
[+1]: Sorin, Last to Fall deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.

cards.card_name: MR01 Laora, Pyre of the Lotus
cards.rules_text:
[+1]: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, create a Black Lotus token. If you don't, create a Treasure token. [i](A Black Lotus is a {0} artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color.” It's not a Lotus.)[/i]
[-3]: Add {R}{R}{R}.
[-5]: Exile the top five cards of your library. You may play cards from among them until the end of your next turn.

cards.rules_text:
Lands are 1/1 creatures in addition to their other types.
[+1]: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
[+1]: Put a shield counter on target land. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[-7]: Each creature you control fights a creature an opponent controls.

cards.rules_text:
When The Torturer enters, exile up to one target permanent that's one or more colors.
[+3]: Destroy target planeswalker. If you controlled it, draw three cards.
[0]: Proliferate [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
[-3]: Return target planeswalker card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
[-8]: Exile any number of target planeswalker cards from graveyards. Add six times that much {C}.

cards.rules_text:
Mutate {0} [i](If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
If you would draw a card for the first time each turn, investigate instead. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a land you control enters, exile it and create a Treasure token.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, put a stun counter on it.
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

Trample
{1}{G}: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability you don't control that targets Gore Tyrant. Draw a card. You may activate this ability while Gore Tyrant is a spell.
